pageTitle: Lickbike.com | Kreitler replacement roller belt - 1/4 x 72 inch
textBeforeTable: Heavy duty polyurethane belts are the factory replacements for your Kreitler rollers. 1/4 x 72 inch is for most 4.5 inch drums (with 2 belt grooves) manufactured within the last 20 years. 1/4 x 66 inch is for 3.0 and 2.25 inch drums. Older Kreitler models (with 1 belt groove) use the 3/16 x 70 inch model, but call us to verify. The 3/16 will also fit many other brands, so take a measurement to be sure. 2938 ... Kreitler replacement roller belt - 1/4 x 72 inch ... $19.88 You can't beat our service and you will love our prices. Lickbike sells only the world's finest bicycles and bike parts.   Spokes Sewup Tape Single Rear Wheel Single Front Wheel
